Changing the World Through Design

The most aesthetically pleasing race on the planet

Learn More Register to Race

Aspect Ration City Tour

The Usability Run, also known as the most aesthetically pleasing race on the planet, is a unique geek race that celebrates familiarity, memorability, and intuitive design. Meet at the start line and be guided through the course by carefully crafted signage. The Usability Run Contrast Ratio City Tour is bringing a 5k, 10k and Half-Marathon straight to Erie, PA with a sweet Usability Zone on course, all-new Gamification Beach at the Finish Festival, and a fresh user-centric participant kit.
